statements: SELECT * FROM potential_business_locations;
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM potential_business_locations;
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM potential_business_locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM potential_business_locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT location_id, ST_AsText(location_geometry) AS geometry_text FROM potential_business_locations;
SELECT * FROM potential_business_locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, location_geometry FROM potential_business_locations WHERE location_id > 10 ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT location_name FROM potential_business_locations WHERE location_name LIKE 'New%' AND location_id BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT location_name FROM potential_business_locations WHERE ST_DISTANCE(location_geometry, ST_GeomFromText('POINT(2 3)', 4326)) < 1000;
SELECT location_id, ST_AsText(location_geometry) AS location_geometry_text FROM potential_business_locations ORDER BY location_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM business_locations ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT location_name, location_geom FROM business_locations WHERE location_id = 100;
SELECT location_name, ST_AsText(location_geom) FROM business_locations WHERE location_id <= 10;
SELECT * FROM potential_sites WHERE ST_Area(site_geom) > 1000;
SELECT site_name, site_geom FROM potential_sites ORDER BY site_id ASC;
SELECT location_name, location_geom FROM business_locations WHERE location_id > 10 ORDER BY location_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT site_name, ST_AsText(site_geom) FROM potential_sites WHERE ST_Area(site_geom) > 1000 ORDER BY site_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location_id, location_name, ST_X(location_geom), ST_Y(location_geom) FROM business_locations WHERE ST_DWithin(location_geom, 'POINT(34.0522 -118.2437)', 0.05) ORDER BY location_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT site_id, site_name, ST_Area(site_geom), ST_Perimeter(site_geom) FROM potential_sites WHERE site_id BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY site_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location_id AS id, location_name AS name, ST_IsEmpty(location_geom) FROM business_locations WHERE ST_IsEmpty(location_geom) = FALSE ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM potential_business_locations LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, location FROM competitors WHERE id = 5;
SELECT city, density FROM population_density WHERE density > 1000 ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT * FROM competitors WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, name, ST_AsText(location) AS location_text FROM potential_business_locations;
SELECT * FROM potential_business_locations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, location FROM competitors ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT city, density FROM population_density WHERE density > 1000;
SELECT * FROM potential_business_locations JOIN competitors ON potential_business_locations.location = competitors.location;

SELECT name AS Business, density AS Population_Density FROM potential_business_locations JOIN population_density ON potential_business_locations.name = population_density.city ORDER BY Population_Density DESC;
SELECT * FROM business_locations;
SELECT business_name, location FROM business_locations WHERE business_name='ABC Corp';
SELECT competitor_id, competitor_name FROM competitors ORDER BY competitor_name ASC;
SELECT location_id, population, income FROM demographics WHERE population > 100000;
SELECT business_name, viability_score FROM business_analysis WHERE viability_score > 0.8 ORDER BY viability_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM business_locations WHERE business_name = 'Example Business'
SELECT location_id, business_name FROM business_locations ORDER BY business_name ASC
SELECT location_id, business_name, ST_AsText(location) FROM business_locations WHERE ST_Intersects(location, ST_SetSRID(ST_MakePoint(0, 0), 4326))
SELECT b.business_name, d.population, d.income FROM business_locations b JOIN demographics d ON b.location_id = d.location_id
SELECT ba.business_name, ba.viability_score, c.competitor_name FROM business_analysis ba INNER JOIN competitors c ON ba.location_id = c.location_id ORDER BY ba.viability_score DESC
SELECT * FROM potential_sites;
SELECT name, location FROM potential_sites ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT income, population FROM demographics WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT competitor_name, distance FROM competitors WHERE distance < 5 ORDER BY competitor_name ASC;
SELECT type_name FROM business_types WHERE type_id = 3;
SELECT name, population, income, age_distribution FROM potential_sites JOIN demographics ON potential_sites.id = demographics.site_id
SELECT competitor_name, distance FROM competitors WHERE distance > 5 ORDER BY competitor_name DESC
SELECT type_name FROM business_types WHERE type_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND type_name LIKE '%restaurant%'
SELECT * FROM potential_sites WHERE id = 1
SELECT location FROM potential_sites JOIN business_locations ON potential_sites.id = business_locations.site_id WHERE business_type_id = 2
